title: Burkett Financial Services buys Bitcoin via ETFs
description:
Burkett Financial Services, a South Carolina-based financial planner, disclosed investments in two Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) on April 1. Burkett’s latest Form 13F filing indicates it holds 602 shares of BlackRock’s iShares Bitcoin Trust (IBIT), a spot Bitcoin ETF. The firm’s holdings are valued at $24,363. The company also holds 630 shares of ProShares’ Bitcoin […]

The post Burkett Financial Services buys Bitcoin via ETFs appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Mi Primer Bitcoin Launches Open-Source Bitcoin Education Initiative
description: With a promising step towards the global financial literacy campaign, Mi Primer Bitcoin, the leader of an amazing Bitcoin education program headquartered in El Salvador, has just released the newest version of its Bitcoin Diploma. The open-source model of the blockchain presentation implies that Bitcoin education can become a beneficial resource for those who do […]
